New Records: West Indies chased down 180 in 19.1 overs with Brandon King and Evin Lewis hitting half-centuries
Sherfane Rutherford finished the match with a four
Key Match Events: West Indies won the match by five wickets
Sri Lanka lost early wickets but managed a competitive total
Sherfane Rutherford scored the winning runs in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell won the toss and opted to bowl first
Sri Lanka captain Charith Asalanka said he would have bowled first as well
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies took a 1-0 lead in the series
Brandon King was awarded Player of the Match for his outstanding knock
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium
The article provided live updates and scorecard
Others: Live feed and advertising sections were part of the match coverage
